attributes.description: This report summarizes the recent errors, latency, and uptime of our Web Application Backend.
attributes.title: Summary of stability and performance for Web App Backend over the last week

200.html:
data

[object]

JSON:API data key with value of a list of dashboard reports.

attributes

object

Attributes for the dashboard report schema.

created_at

date-time

Date the report was created.

description

string

Description of the report used in both the user interface, and as part of the email body for each report sent. Must be a UTF-8 encoded string less than 4 KiB in size.

destinations

object

Report destination-specific configuration. This determines how reports are sent. Only email destinations are supported.

email

object

Email destinations for a report.

recipient_addresses

[string]

List of email addresses to send reports to.

modified_at

date-time

Date the report was most recently modified.

schedule

object

Report schedule-specific configuration that defines when and how often a report is sent.

active

boolean

Enables or disables automatic report sending as configured in the report's schedule. If set to false, schedule is paused and reports are not sent.

frequency

enum

Frequency with which to send the report. Allowed enum values: 1d,2d,3d,4d,5d,6d,1w,2w,3w,1mo,2mo,3mo,4mo,5mo,6mo,7mo,8mo,9mo,10mo,11mo,12mo

repeat_at

enum

ISO8601 formatted time (HH:MM) to send the report, using the time zone specified in the timezone field. Allowed enum values: 00:00,00:30,01:00,01:30,02:00,02:30,03:00,03:30,04:00,04:30,05:00,05:30,06:00,06:30,07:00,07:30,08:00,08:30,09:00,09:30,10:00,10:30,11:00,11:30,12:00,12:30,13:00,13:30,14:00,14:30,15:00,15:30,16:00,16:30,17:00,17:30,18:00,18:30,19:00,19:30,20:00,20:30,21:00,21:30,22:00,22:30,23:00,23:30

repeat_on_day_of_month

enum

Defines which day of the month to send the monthly report. If the frequency field uses months (for example, 1mo), this field is required. If the frequency field does not use months (for example 1d, 1w), then this field must be null (if provided). If this field is not provided in an update request, and the update request changes the frequency to use days or weeks (for example, 1d, 1w), then this field is automatically set to null. This field is mutually exclusive with repeat_on_day_of_week, and cannot be defined in the same request that includes a non-null value for repeat_on_day_of_week. Allowed enum values: 1st,15th,

repeat_on_day_of_week

enum

Defines which day of the week to send the weekly report. If the frequency field uses weeks (such as 1w), this field is required and defines which day of the week to send the report. If the frequency field does not use weeks (for example, 1d, 1mo), then this field must be null (if provided). If this field is not provided in an update request, and the update request changes the frequency to use days or months (for example, 1d, 1mo), then this field is automatically set to null. This field is mutually exclusive with repeat_on_day_of_month and cannot be defined in the same request that includes a non-null value for repeat_on_day_of_month. Allowed enum values: Monday,Tuesday,Wednesday,Thursday,Friday,Saturday,Sunday,

timezone

string

Time zone to use for repeat_at. Must be a valid Time Zone Database (https://www.iana.org/time-zones) name

template_variables

object

Template variables used to parameterize the dashboard when generating a report.

<any-key>

string

Key/value pairs for template variables.

timeframe

enum

Time period covered by the widgets in the dashboard report, at the time of report generation. Allowed enum values: 5m,15m,30m,1h,4h,1d,2d,1w,1mo

title

string

Title of the report in both the user interface, and as part of the email subject for each report sent.

id [required]

string

ID of the dashboard report.

relationships

object

Relationships of a dashboard report.

dashboard

object

Dashboard associated with the report.

data [required]

object

JSON:API data representing a report's associated dashboard.

id [required]

string

ID of a report's associated dashboard. Screenboards (dashboards with layout_type=FREE) are not supported.

type [required]

enum

JSON:API type of the report's associated dashboard. Allowed enum values: dashboards

type [required]

enum

JSON:API type of the dashboard report. Allowed enum values: dashboard_reports

403.html:
errors [required]

[string]

A list of errors.

404.html:
errors [required]

[string]

A list of errors.

422.html:
errors [required]

[string]

A list of errors.

429.html:
errors [required]

[string]

A list of errors.

attributes.title: Summary of stability and performance for Web App Backend over the last week

data [required]

object

JSON:API data key.

attributes

object

Attributes of a dashboard report that can be updated. Fields that are not to be updated can be omitted, with some exceptions for repeat_on_day_of_week and repeat_on_day_of_month, as noted in their respective sections.

description

string

Description of the report in both the user interface and as part of the email body for each report sent. Must be a UTF-8 encoded string less than 4 KiB in size.

destinations

object

Report destination-specific configuration. This determines how reports are sent. Only email destinations are supported.

email

[string]

enum

If the frequency field does not use months (for example 1d, 1w), then this field must be null (if provided). If this field is not provided in an update request, and the update request changes the frequency to use days or weeks (for example, 1d, 1w), then this field is automatically set to null. timeframe

enum

Time period covered by the widgets in the dashboard report, at the time of report generation. Allowed enum values: 5m,15m,30m,1h,4h,1d,2d,1w,1mo

title

string

Title of the report in both the user interface, and as part of the email subject for each report sent.

id [required]

string

ID of the report to update.

type [required]

enum

JSON:API type of the dashboard report. Allowed enum values: dashboard_reports
